content: NPU Knockout sets (1/2 to 2”) or (2-1/2 to 4”) Knockout die, punch, and draw stud sets for punching ½ - 4” diameter conduit holes in up to 10-gauge steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Knockout tool inserts ### FEATURES:Features Improve punching accuracy and productivity – alignment markings help you position the hole precisely Clean-cut holes – engineered to deliver a clean edge when used with Hilti cordless knockout punch tools Wide diameter range – combinations available for punching ½” up to 4” diameter conduit holes Applications Punching conduit holes in mild steel up to 10 gauge Punching conduit holes in stainless steel up to 12 gauge ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2358375 - Set NPU 1/2 - 2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPU P 1 Punch - 1x NPU P 1/2 Punch - 1x NPU P 3/4 Punch - 1x NPU P 1-1/2 Punch - 1x NPU P 1-1/4 Punch - 1x NPU P 2 Punch - 1x Punching NPU S 7/16 Stud bolt - 1x Punching NPU S 3/4 Stud bolt - 1x Punching NPU D 1 Die - 1x NPU D 1/2 Die - 1x Punching NPU D 3/4 Die - 1x Punching NPU D 1-1/2 Die - 1x Punching NPU D 1-1/4 Die - 1x Punching NPU D 2 Die - 2358376 - Set NPU 2-1/2 - 4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPU D 2-1/2 Knockout die - 1x NPU D 3 Knockout die - 1x NPU D 4 Knockout die - 1x NPU P 2-1/2 Punch - 1x NPU P 3” Punch - 1x NPU P 4” Punch - 1x NPU S 1-1/8 Draw stud
